item.title: What Are Attention Masks?
item.description: TLDR: Attention masks allow us to send a batch into the transformer even when the examples in the batch have varying lengths. We do this by padding all sequences to the same length, then using the “attention_mask” tensor to identify which tokens are padding. Here we use a batch with three samples padded from the left since we want to predict the next token on the right. (Padding on the right would probably predict another pad.
